类 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.Pausing

    AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener

    public static class AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.Pausing
extends AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.Adapter
    A listener that invokes Thread.sleep(long) prior to every batch but the first batch.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Pausing

        protected Pausing(long value)
        Creates a new pausing listener.
        参数:
        value - The time to sleep in milliseconds between every two batches.

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        public static AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener of(long value,
                                                            TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Creates a listener that pauses for the specified amount of time. If the specified value is 0, a non-operational listener is returned.
        参数:
        value - The amount of time to pause between redefinition batches.
        timeUnit - The time unit of value.
        返回:
        An appropriate listener.

      • onBatch

        public void onBatch(int index,
                    List<Class<?>> batch,
                    List<Class<?>> types)
        从接口复制的说明: AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener
        Invoked before applying a batch.
        指定者:
        onBatch 在接口中 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener
        覆盖:
        onBatch 在类中 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.Adapter
        参数:
        index - A running index of the batch starting at 0.
        batch - The types included in this batch.
        types - All types included in the redefinition.
